author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great
review: When I reviewed the Tunnel Transport I said that was my only rock raider set,I forgot about this one.It is a nice set the people and crystal are great to have.If you like rock Raiders this is a must have!

author: brickbuster2409
title: reel important set for RR fans
review: in my opinion i think this set is a definite must have if you need to complete or start your RR minifig collection.  I don't really find anything bad about this set.  so to be frank, you have nothing to lose if you get this set.

author: zinkk757
title: 5/5 nothin wrong here
review: this set is just the coolest thing ever.  priced at aprox. $5.00, nothing can go wrong.  5 minifigures including the orange one that comes with this set and the huge one in the series.  i think that the saw thing with the rock is really cool too.  well, the picture pretty much says it all.  tools, figures, rock, saws, all together a great set.  GET IT

author: omgbrick
title: 5 minifigs for five bucks=
review: Great deal seeing as I only got this and one other small Rock Raiders set. For such a small set you get all of the rockraiders team except for the leader, plus it includs tools for them. The brown rock looks good and can store the neon stone easily and its easy to open. The minifigslook good and can be used for many differnt Moc's. All in all a great set for rockraiders. 5/5

author: Imperial13
title: Crystal!
review: when i got this set back in 1999 it was most of my figs. i got it and a huge (for me at the time) 1000 pieces. it also came with a mysterius crystal which i still have =) and all the helmets and tools for my cars and all that stuff.

author: deluckybrick
title: Needed for Rock Raiders, if you dont want to spend a ton of cash.
review:
This set is inexpensive, so no risk there.  You get all the minifigs you need, and you pay a fraction of the price then for the whole collection.

Pros:
-About $6
-Plenty of minifigs
-Cool tools
-Rock with Brickonium

Cons:
-Just about none!

author: hustla187
title: Good and cheap set.
review: This set would be $5 when it was first released. It came with 5 minifigs, a rock, and a little tool shed. There is absolutely positvely a good set to buy if you are a Rock Raiders fan like I am. Definitely a 5 out of 5.

author: Rgijaba
title: a speedy way to get the rock raiders crew and some tools
review: it has Docs,bandet, sparks, axle, and my favorite, jet.its missing cheif, but oh well. it comes with a green energy crystle and a ore. it even has a cool and funny comic!get it if your a rock raiders fan, or want a set with some tools, or if you want most of the rock raiders crew.

author: krysto2002
title: The rock raiders story line
review:
This is a summary of the story line for the series, followd by a quick review of the set.

The storyline for the series is about an intergalactic mining squad called the Rock Raiders, who, traveling aboard the massive mothership the LMS Explorer (perhaps the LMS means Lego Media Systems...), get hit by an incoming meteor being pulled into a massive black hole, sending them into the wormhole as well, rocketing them across the Universe to another unkown galaxy. Since the ship's systems are damaged they are unable to return without the required fuel, energy crystals. Geological scanners detect that the nearby terrestrial planet is loaded with the crystals they need. The ship stations itself over the planet, teleporting down a team of miners and geologists, who go forth to mine out the crystals. The planet contains many underground rivers, lava flows, caverns, and in some cases, arctic-like regions deep underground. They must collect all the necessary materials in order to repair the ship and return home. The six characters (five of which are in this set) are as follows: Jet, the pilot (female); Axle the driver (black torso, brown helmet); sparks the engineer (orange, you can't miss him); Bandit the Helmsman and Boatsman (red torso); Docs the geologist (dark gray with bandana); and the cheif (not included, hard to find).

This set has the five characters, sparks is actuall pretty rare, and so is this set. Now it is much more expensive than ever, but at its original price (approx. $10) was a steal! The set has loads of tools and a control panel, as well as five, yes five (5!), minifigures. This is an excellent booster pack, very similar to the unnaturaly coveted star wars battle packs. For any collector, this is a must have.

author: Yoda____
title: Classic
review: This set is a classic it has loads of figures and afew accesories but there isn't realy any building in it so I gave it a 4. If you see this anywhere just buy it, there's no reason why not to, if it's cheap because on the other hand there isn't any reason to get it. If you're possitive and see it at a low price then get it.

author: ROCK_RAIDER_GUY
title: Great!!
review:
My First R and R set. This was a really good set. All the Characters in one set with some extras. I got this a Zellars for 99 cents

PROS
all the Rock Raiders(except cheif)
a Crysal and Ore

Cons
no mining equipment except the saw thing

OVERALL

Very Good!!

author: chemxcore
title: YES
review: I never owned any rock raiders except for this minifig pack.  I regret this tremendously, as these are THE BEST MINIFIGS EVER CREATED.  I don't know what it is, but they are just great.  I was at the cusp of my lego dark ages, this may have been one of the last sets I purchased (right before high school started.)  I think now I am back on the circuit I will go buy some other sets!

author: Alexpanter
title: Lego should make more of this kinda sets
review:
I bought this because someone gave me the Rock Raiders PC game. Then I wanted to have some Rock Raiders minifigs. Lego should make more of this kinda   
"all minifigs of the theme+ some tools" sets. This set has all the "normal" Rock Raiders (Sparks, Axle, Jet, Bandit, Docs). However Chief is not in this set :(


Pros:

Minifigs (duh)

A lot of tools (duh too)

Rare tools

Little comic book 


Cons:

Not all tools fit in the tool station :P

Its hard to make Docs stand stable while having his big chainsaw thingie in his hands. A normal plate however can fix this.

We Are Missing CHIEF!

-Alex

PS: RRU (rockraidersunited) Wiki says LMS means Lego Mining Ship (http://rockraidersunited.org/wiki/index.php?title=LMS)

author: Planetsbend
title: Great small set to any collection beginning.
review: This set I bought with my first allowance and I really got a kick out of it. At that age I really got into legos so I bought this to start my collection. I like the fact that it had minifigures and tools which I had never had. One of the foundation sets for me. Great to have.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Rock Raiders - The Rock Raiders
review:
The The Rock Raiders (4930) is a LEGO Rock Raiders set which came out in 1999. It comes with 5 minifigs and 46 pieces. This set does include no decals and there're no mistakes in the instructions and no missing pieces. This set also has a comic book.

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/4930-1.jpg[/img]


Minifigures:

Sparks: Sparks comes with an orange overall with some green markings on it and some tools. He has a gray helmet with black goggles and on his face you can see red hair and a beard.

Bandit: Bandit comes with a black helmet, blue pants, and a red shirt with a green overall on it. On his face he has a blue headband and a brown beard.

Axel: Axel comes with a brown helmet and a transparent yellow visor. He has dark gray pants and a black belt. Axel also got a black shirt with a dark gray overall. On his face he's got orange hair and a smiley face.

Docs: Docs comes with a dark gray overall, a dark gray hat, a black bandanna. He has brown hair on his face and glasses on the top of his hair

Jet: Jet comes with a blue shirt with a dark gray overall, blue pants, a dark gray helmet and a transparent yellow visor. On her face you can see white hair and a headset. Jet is the only female miner LEGO ever made. I haven't seen any female miners in the Power Miners theme.

Accessories:

The accessories we get are a double-sided chain saw with a handle where the minifig can hold it. We also get a pair of binoculars, a walkie-talkie, a hammer, a drill, a screw driver, a wrench and a computer. We also get a huge rock which can be opened. In the inside you can see a crystal. What is a little bit disappointing about this set is that the Rock Raider captain which you've seen in the videogame doesn't appear in this set. I also think this set is more an accessory to your LEGO Rock Raiders and to your LEGO Power Miners collection but I would buy the other sets of those two themes first before you buy this set.

Positive:

Great pieces which you can use for brickfilms or MOC's
Minifigs
Great starter set
Crystal
Nice accessory to your LEGO Rock Raider (or LEGO Power Miners) collection


Negative:

No play features
Too easy to build
No rock raider captain


All in all this set is okay and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full galery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
